name: Reaxxion (Demo Version)
description: Like no breakout game before it, Reaxxion is a unique entertainment experience that will capture your imagination and excite your senses. Generate and absorb balls into the liquid metal paddle, or transform balls into golden, brick-busting dynamos in the "Reaxxion Chamber." With nine smashing power-ups and secret challenge levels, this electrifying game features the ultimate in variety and player-controlled action.
